players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Diana's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems like a waste when we could have confirmed a town role."
You: "I investigated Charlie to confirm a potential suspect, not to waste a night. Diana was an unknown, Charlie is now confirmed mafia."

Charlie: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you really were the detective, wouldn't revealing yourself immediately make you the next target? This feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the real detective, you should have investigated Diana to confirm a town role. Your choice to investigate Charlie instead seems like a mafia trying to frame him."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
